tooltips.Power_Adaptor: Check this if you have the power cable/adaptor
tooltips.Notes: Extra stuff for condition or anything else you wanna put on here
tooltips.tested/reset: Device is tested to be fully functional, and all sensitive data has been erased.
tooltips.parts: Device did not pass testing but may have parts value, or device may be more valuable as parts.  Note reason for classification (missing functionality or parts, etc).
tooltips.untestable: Device is untestable, either fully or beyond a basic power test.  Be sure to note reason for being untestable.
